activeScore.description: Functionality removed. A response is returned for backward compatibility.

activityCalories.description: The number of calories burned for the day during periods the user was active above sedentary level.

caloriesBMR.description: Total BMR calories burned for the day.

caloriesOut.description: Total calories burned for the day.

distance.description: The distance traveled for the day.

distances.description: List of distances traveled for the day.

elevation.description: The elevation traveled for the day.

fairlyActiveMinutes.description: Total minutes the user was fairly/moderately active.

floors.description: The equivalent floors climbed for the day.

lightlyActiveMinutes.description: Total minutes the user was lightly active.

marginalCalories.description: Total marginal estimated calories burned for the day.

restingHeartRate.description: The user's calculated resting heart rate.

sedentaryMinutes.description: Total minutes the user was sedentary.

steps.description: Total steps taken for the day.

veryActiveMinutes.description: Total minutes the user was very active.
